txt.en: You have arrived under the bridge of the Cross-roads of Ash

New information has come to light that the Orcs have been after one forge in particular: the ancient forge of Hurmulkezer. They have used it to forge flaming armour, and have plans to craft a deadly new weapon as well....

'The ancient forge at Hurmulkezer is responsible for all of this flaming armour we see on the Ghâsh-hai, and it would seem it is being used to forge great weapons as well.

'Go speak to Regin, the former care-taker for the forge, to find out how to stop the Orcs from using it.

'He can be found underneath and just south of the Cross-roads of Ash; he is working on reinforcing the bridges.'

Regin can be found in the south-west corner of the Flaming Deeps, underneath and just south of the Cross-roads of Ash.\n\nYou should find and speak with Regin by taking the stairs down from the Cross-roads of Ash.
'There is a way to shut the forge down? We must see to that at once! The Orcs cannot be allowed to continue using it against us.'
Regin can be found in the south-west corner of the Flaming Deeps, underneath and just south of the Cross-roads of Ash.\n\nYou should find and speak with Regin.
Gúthi is at the Cross-roads of Ash, in the western Flaming Deeps.\n\nYou should return to Gúthi.
'Go speak with Regin. The longer you delay, the better the chances the Orcs have of using the ancient forge against us.'

'The Orcs have control of the ancient forge? This cannot be! No wonder they are so strong and fell in these forsaken deeps.

'Thankfully, there is a way to stop them. I come from a long line of dwarves who passed down knowledge of the forge, and it happens that there is a failsafe in such an event. Take this Mithril tuning fork and sound it near the forge to shut it down.

'Be sharp, [placeholder] -- attackers are near!'
'Watch over Regin. The longer you delay, the more danger he is in.'
Head beneath the Cross-roads of Ash bridge
Talk to Regin below the southern bridge out of the Cross-roads of Ash
Talk to Gúthi at the Cross-roads of Ash
